question: In the Base of Skull, identify the 204 structure. <image 1>
description:
The image depicts a detailed anatomical illustration of the base of the skull. The structure labeled "204" is located near the center of the image, slightly towards the upper portion. This structure appears to be a bony projection or plate that extends laterally from the main body of the skull. Given its position and appearance, it is likely related to the pterygoid process of the sphenoid bone.

Based on this description, the structure labeled "204" corresponds to:

A. Lateral pterygoid plate
